home.title: Document Objects
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit a Document Object

documentObject.created: A new document was created with identifier {{ param }}
documentObject.updated: A document was updated with identifier {{ param }}
documentObject.deleted: A document was deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Document Object {{ id }}?

documentObject.name: Name

help.path: The folder structure of the object using human readable path components
help.name: The human readable name of the document
help.pathUuid: The folder structure as an internal UUID
help.nameUuid: The name of the document as an internal UUID
help.mimeType: The MIME type of the document
help.objectUrl: The S3 object key to access the document
help.thumbnailUrl: The S3 object key to access a thumbnail of the document
help.byteSize: Size in bytes of the document
help.numberOfPages: Number of pages of the document (if e.g. PDF). If not given, the document is not page oriented
